name: Vinyl Rebel
description:
In a futuristic black and white world where a mechanized govt. has banned all forms of music, you are a vinyl smuggler that stumbles upon a mysterious device that sends you on a journey to restore color to the world.

In the spirit of the VRJam2020 theme "One Tool, Many Uses", music in its different forms will allow you to defeat enemies and escape their grasp

TheCheshire - Project lead, gun & vinyl disc mechanics, locomotion
TheSilverFox - Level Designer, story lead
SkiesXR - Art direction, enemy AI, UI

Development Tools:

  • Unity
  • SteamVR Unity Plugin
  • Oculus Rift
  • Tilt Brush
  • Mixamo
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
